mapper.select: SELECT A.AP_ID, TO_CHAR(A.AP_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd')AS AP_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.AP_TIME, 'HH24:MI')AS AP_TIME, A.SELECT_LANGUAGE, H.HOS_NAME_ENG, D.DEPT_NAME_ENG FROM APPOINTMENT A, DEPARTMENT D, HOSPITAL H WHERE USER_ID = #{id} AND A.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID AND A.HOS_ID = H.HOS_ID

SELECT A.AP_ID, TO_CHAR(A.AP_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd')AS AP_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.AP_TIME, 'HH24:MI')AS AP_TIME, A.SELECT_LANGUAGE, H.HOS_NAME_ENG, D.DEPT_NAME_ENG FROM APPOINTMENT A, DEPARTMENT D, HOSPITAL H WHERE A.AP_ID = #{ap_id} AND A.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID AND A.HOS_ID = H.HOS_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPOINTMENT (AP_ID, AP_DATE, AP_TIME, SELECT_LANGUAGE, USER_ID, HOS_ID, DEPT_ID, MESSAGE, DOC_ID) VALUES(AP_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{date}, #{time}, #{select_language}, #{id}, #{hos_id}, #{dept_id}, #{message}, #{doc_id})
mapper.select: WITH TT AS (SELECT (SELECT TIME AS TXT FROM TIMETABLE WHERE DOC_ID=#{doc_id} AND DAY=#{day})TXT FROM DUAL )SELECT TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(TXT, '[^:]+', 1, LEVEL)) AS TIME FROM TT CONNECT BY INSTR(TXT, ':', 1, LEVEL - 1) > 0 MINUS SELECT TO_CHAR(AP_TIME, 'HH24') AS AP_TIME FROM APPOINTMENT WHERE DOC_ID=#{doc_id} AND AP_DATE=#{date}
